ISSUE.TITLE: Bug: when searching a query, `can't access property "dt", col is undefined`. Even though the field is selected correctly
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I'm managing my database with Hasura. I connected it to Nocodb and whenever I'm trying to make a search key of any field in one of my table, ![CleanShot 2021-05-31 at 15 57 28](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16015833/120204304-f338d300-c228-11eb-9a2f-5492d781eddd.png) I get the following JS error in the console: ``` TypeError: can't access property "dt", col is undefined ```

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(gui): correct border radius of navbar icons fix #211 Signed-off-by: Pranav C Balan <pranavxc@gmail.com>

COMMIT.MESSAGE: fix(gui): search field selection fixes search filed selection issue which breaks entire ui. fix #210 Signed-off-by: Pranav C Balan <pranavxc@gmail.com>
